Shared.Enable.Name: Enable
Shared.Enable.Desc:
If this box is checked, custom transparency settings will be used for these objects.

If not, the game's default transparency system will be used.
Shared.Below.Name: Below player only
Shared.Below.Desc: If this box is checked, an object will only be transparent if it's vertically lower than the player.
Shared.Distance.Name: Tile distance
Shared.Distance.Desc: If the number of tiles between the player and an object is less than this setting, the object will be transparent.
Shared.MinimumOpacity.Name: Minimum opacity
Shared.MinimumOpacity.Desc: The least visible an object can be, from 0 (completely invisible) to 1 (always fully visible).
Building.Title.Name: Building settings
Building.Title.Desc: Transparency settings for player-constructed farm buildings.
Bush.Title.Name: Bush settings
Bush.Title.Desc:
Transparency settings for bushes.

Note: These settings only affect bushes that players can interact with.
Tree.Title.Name: Tree settings
Tree.Title.Desc:
Transparency settings for trees.

Note: These settings only affect trees that players can interact with.
Grass.Title.Name: Grass settings
Crop.Title.Name: Crop settings
Object.Title.Name: Object settings
Object.Title.Desc: Transparency settings for small objects, such as forage, weeds, ore, etc.
Craftable.Title.Name: Craftable settings
Craftable.Title.Desc: Transparency settings for craftable and placeable objects, such as machines and scarecrows.
KeyBindings.Title.Name: Key bindings
KeyBindings.Title.Desc: Keybind settings for this mod's optional toggle controls.
KeyBindings.Disable.Name: Disable transparency
KeyBindings.Disable.Desc:
A list of keybinds that toggle between this mod's settings and normal Stardew transparency.

See the wiki for info about multi-key bindings: https://stardewvalleywiki.com/Modding:Player_Guide/Key_Bindings
KeyBindings.Full.Name: Full transparency
KeyBindings.Full.Desc:
A list of keybinds that toggle between this mod's settings and maximum transparency on all objects.

See the wiki for info about multi-key bindings: https://stardewvalleywiki.com/Modding:Player_Guide/Key_Bindings
